channel.description: Recent content in javascript on thmsdnnr.com

item.title: ES6 â€” Destructuring + Default Parameters
item.description: Object and Array destructuring in ES6 allows you to easily extract selected properties of nested objects.

item.title: Speeding Up Repetitive Calculations with Memoization
item.description: Introducing memoization, a technique to speed up computation by re-using previously computed results. Shows an exasmple using factorial and considers the time/space tradeoffs involved with memoization.

item.title: Koch Snowflakes
item.description: Building Fractal Art with Koch Snowflakes on HTML5 Canvas.

item.title: Pixl: A Sea of CSS [part 5]
item.description: Add CSS styling to make the app responsive on multiple screen sizes using media queries and flexbox.

item.title: Pixl: Scaling & Saving Art [part 4]
item.description: Enabling save and restore of images using the browser's localStorage API.

item.title: Pixl: Scaling & Saving Art [part 3]
item.description: Canvas scaling, transparent backgrounds, and a first step at saving the images.

item.title: Pixl: Color Palette & Enhanced UI [part 2]
item.description: Adding a randomized color palette selector using jscolor.

item.title: Pixl: A Pixel Art Editor w/Canvas [part 1]
item.description: A full-featured, 5-part tutorial on creating a pixel art editor using JavaScript and HTML5 Canvas. Supports saving and loading images, color selection, transparent backgrounds, and more.

item.title: Fractal Art and Sierpinski Triangles
item.description: Building a Sierpinski Triangle with HTML5 Canvas and JavaScript.

item.title: Events and Event Listeners in JavaScript
item.description: JavaScript is a fundamentally event-driven programming language. Learn about the event loop, adding handlers to events with listeners, and debouncing for limiting the number of times those handlers are called.

item.title: Document Object Model (DOM) Selectors
item.description: Introduces the Document Object Model view of a webpage, covering how we can use Selectors to select objects of interest on the page and manipulate them.

item.title: Map, Filter, and Reduce: Functional Programming Gems
item.description: Introduces Map, Filter, and Reduce methods with an Application example calculating Standard Deviation.

item.title: WebStorage API: localStorage and sessionStorage
item.description: WebStorage API, localStorage, and sessionStorage

item.title: Let's Code a Pomodoro Timer
item.description: We build a Pomodoro Timer, a popular time-management tool that breaks work in to 25 minutes segments of work combined with 5 minute periods of rest.

item.title: Scope & Closures: let vs var in JavaScript
item.description: Closures allow a function to retain information about its context after the function has returned. We provide examples and cases where closures can be useful.

item.title: Code a Weather App
item.description: We create a weather application using the National Weather Service API to learn about Asynchronous code using Promises and Application Programming Interfaces (APIs).

item.title: John Conway's Game of Life: Cellular Automata
item.description: John Conway's Game of Life simulation implemented in JavaScript.

item.title: Create an Animated LCD Display
item.description: We build a retro look-and-feel LCD display using dynamically-animated SVG with JavaScript.

item.title: Intro to D3 Graphs + visualize sorting algorithms
item.description: Visualizing Sorting Algorithms in D3

item.title: Intro to D3: Bar Graphs
item.description: We learn the basics of D3 and how to use it to build bar graphs.
